name: jobscrapper-chrome-extension
description: Chrome extension for automated job scraping and application with MERN stack backend

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run build:extension:watch"
scripts.build: npm run build:extension && cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install

author: Your Name
